examples: Potentilla porphyracea F.Saut. in Oesterr. Bot. Zeitschr., 38: 113 (1888).
source: According to Index Herbariorum Collectors he died 1898, but there is a note by F.Sauter in Oesterr. Bot. Zeitschr., 57: 438 (1907) and F. Sauter is listed with * for authentic address in Doerfler, Botaniker Adressbuch ed.3: 229 (1909); Death year in: Berichte des Naturwissenschaftlich-medizinischen Vereins in Innsbruck 36: XIV-XV. 1917 (via Stefan Dressler; FR)
